statements: DELETE FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE id = 1 AND temperature > 25.5
DELETE FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE light_intensity < 500 AND humidity < 70
DELETE FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
DELETE FROM plant_data WHERE growth_stage = 'Flowering' AND last_watering_date < '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Greenhouse Room 1';
DELETE FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Temperature' AND reading_id IN (SELECT reading_id FROM Readings WHERE temperature > 30);
